resources.string: 【Automatic renewal instructions】 \*Automatic renewal: This product is an automatic renewal package, and the renewal fee will be charged to the account within 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period \*Cancel renewal: Subscription will automatically renew unless automatic renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period \*All payments will be confirmed through your iTunes account. You can manage subscriptions and turn off automatic subscriptions in your iTunes account settings.
I use it to count many pipes and rods and the count has always been correct.
This is very convenient within a few clicks accurately measure areas. Enough for my needs!
Many times I measure something and not had a measuring tape or a ruler nearby. Now I just pull out my phone!
Very convenient and allows you to accurately measure areas in just a few clicks.
